trans-unit.source: Represents a Workflow role that is backed by a <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 表示工作流程角色，並受到<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider>.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] For more information about roles in ASP.NET, see [Role Providers](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96709).
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]如需在 ASP.NET 中角色的詳細資訊，請參閱[角色提供者](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96709)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"></xref> class by using the specified role name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"></xref>使用指定的角色名稱的類別。

trans-unit.source: A string that defines the name of the role.
trans-unit.target: 定義的角色名稱的字串。

trans-unit.source: roleName contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: roleName包含 null 參考 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"></xref> class by using the specified role name and role provider.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"></xref>使用指定的角色名稱和角色提供者的類別。

trans-unit.source: The most commonly used role providers for <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole> are classes that inherit from <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 最常使用角色提供者<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole>是繼承自<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider>.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider>類別</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole>

trans-unit.source: These classes include <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>, <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider> and <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 這些類別包括<xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>、<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider>和<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>。</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider> </xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider> </xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>

trans-unit.source: A string that defines the name of the role.
trans-unit.target: 定義的角色名稱的字串。

trans-unit.source: A string that defines the role provider.
trans-unit.target: 定義角色提供者的字串。

trans-unit.source: roleName contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: roleName包含 null 參考 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a generic list of ASP.NET accounts associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回泛型清單的 ASP.NET 帳戶相關聯<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider> supports only <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.IsUserInRole%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetRolesForUser%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>僅支援<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.IsUserInRole%2A>和<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetRolesForUser%2A>。</xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetRolesForUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.IsUserInRole%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>

trans-unit.source: Furthermore, it supports these methods only for the user account that is currently the WindowsPrincipal associated with the request context, so you cannot call <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetRolesForUser%2A> for any user account in the domain.
trans-unit.target: 此外，它支援這些方法只會針對正在 WindowsPrincipal 的使用者帳戶與內容相關聯的要求，因此無法呼叫<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetRolesForUser%2A>為任何網域中的使用者帳戶。</xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetRolesForUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: When using the GetIdentities method with the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>, the following provider exception is thrown: The configured Role Provider (WindowsTokenRoleProvider) relies upon Windows authentication to determine the groups that the user is allowed to be a member of.
trans-unit.target: 當使用 GetIdentities 方法與<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>，擲回下列提供者例外狀況︰ 設定的角色提供者 (WindowsTokenRoleProvider) 依賴 Windows 驗證，來判斷允許使用者隸屬的群組。</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET Role Manager cannot be used to manage Windows users and groups.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 角色管理員無法用來管理 Windows 使用者和群組。

trans-unit.source: Use the SQLRoleProvider if you want to support custom user/role assignment.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要支援自訂的使用者/角色指派，請使用 SQLRoleProvider。

trans-unit.source: A generic list of string values that represent the ASP.NET accounts associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 泛型清單的字串值，表示 ASP.NET 帳戶相關聯<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"></xref> contains the specified identity
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出是否<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"></xref>包含指定的身分識別

trans-unit.source: The name of the identity to test for.
trans-unit.target: 若要測試的身分識別的名稱。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"></xref> contains the specified identity; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"></xref>包含指定的身分識別，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定名稱<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含名稱<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Name was set to a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 設定名稱為 null 參考 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the role provider for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定角色提供者<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The most commonly used role providers for <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole> are classes that inherit from <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 最常使用角色提供者<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole>是繼承自<xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider>.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider>類別</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole>

trans-unit.source: These classes include <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>, <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider> and <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 這些類別包括<xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>、<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider>和<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>。</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider> </xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider> </xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the role provider for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含的角色提供者<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"> </xref>。
